languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, срочное донесение — мы получили астропатическое послание от имени регента Ааронто Орселлио. Навигаторы обеспокоены судьбой Кассии, пропавшей со станции Эурак-V. Регент запрашивает ее текущий статус, а также возможность личной встречи для проведения переговоров и передачи Леди-Навигатора в лоно Дома".

traits.locale_text: "Лорд-капитан, срочное донесение — мы получили астропатическое послание от имени регента Ааронто Орселлио. Навигаторы обеспокоены судьбой Кассии, пропавшей со станции Эурак-V. Регент запрашивает ее текущий статус, а также возможность личной встречи для проведения переговоров и передачи Леди-Навигатора в лоно дома".

languages.text: "Lord Captain, urgent report — we have received an Astropathic message from Regent Aaronto Orsellio. The Navigators are concerned about the fate of Cassia, who disappeared from Eurac V. The regent is requesting an update on her current status and he has also enquired about the possibility of a personal meeting to negotiate and to arrange the return of the Lady Navigator to her House."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, срочное донесение — мы получили астропатическое послание от имени регента Ааронто Орселлио. Навигаторы обеспокоены судьбой Кассии, пропавшей со станции Эурак-V. Регент запрашивает ее текущий статус, а также возможность личной встречи для проведения переговоров и передачи Леди-Навигатора в лоно Дома".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, urgent message — we have received an astropathic message from Regent Aaronto Orsellio. The Navigators are concerned about the fate of Cassia, who has disappeared from the Eurac-V station. The Regent requests her current status, as well as inquires about the possibility of a personal meeting for negotiations and the transfer of the Lady Navigator to the fold of the House."

"Lord Captain, urgent message — we have received an astropathic message from Regent Aaronto Orsellio. The Navigators are concerned about the fate of Cassia, who has disappeared from the Eurac-V station. The Regent requests her current status, as well as inquires about the possibility of a personal meeting for negotiations and the transfer of the Lady Navigator to the fold of the House."

The regent is requesting an update on her current status and he has also enquired about the possibility of a personal meeting to negotiate and to arrange the return of the Lady Navigator to her House."

The regent is requesting an update on her current status and he has also enquired about the possibility of a personal meeting to negotiate and to arrange the return of the Lady Navigator to her House."

languages.text: “舰长大人，紧急报告，我们收到了来自阿伦托·奥赛罗摄政王的星语信息。他的家族听说卡西娅从欧拉克五号星站中失踪，感到无比担忧。摄政王要求您告知卡西娅目前的状况，还询问了亲自见面谈判的可能性，他希望您能安排导航者女士返回她的家族。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, urgent report — we have received an Astropathic message from Regent Aaronto Orsellio. The Navigators are concerned about the fate of Cassia, who disappeared from Eurac V. The regent is requesting an update on her current status and he has also enquired about the possibility of a personal meeting to negotiate and to arrange the return of the Lady Navigator to her House."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，紧急报告，我们收到了来自阿伦托·奥塞罗摄政王的星语信息。他的家族听说卡西娅从欧拉克五号星中失踪，感到无比担忧。摄政王要求您告知卡西娅目前的状况，还询问了亲自见面谈判的可能性，他希望您能安排导航者女士返回她的家族。”

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, informe urgente: acabamos de recibir un mensaje astropático del regente Aaronto Orsellio. Los Navegantes están preocupados por el estado de Cassia desde que desapareció de Eurac V. El regente solicita una actualización sobre su estado actual y también ha consultado la posibilidad de un encuentro en persona para negociar y organizar el retorno de la lady Navegante a su casa».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, urgent report — we have received an Astropathic message from Regent Aaronto Orsellio. The Navigators are concerned about the fate of Cassia, who disappeared from Eurac V. The regent is requesting an update on her current status and he has also enquired about the possibility of a personal meeting to negotiate and to arrange the return of the Lady Navigator to her House."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, informe urgente: acabamos de recibir un mensaje astropático del regente Aaronto Orsellio. Los Navegantes están preocupados por el estado de Cassia desde que desapareció de Eurac-V. El regente solicita una actualización sobre su estado actual y también ha consultado la posibilidad de un encuentro en persona para negociar y organizar el retorno de la lady Navegante a su casa».

languages.text: "Lord Captain, eine dringende Meldung ... wird haben eine astropathische Nachricht von Regent Aaronto Orsellio erhalten. Die Navigatoren sorgen sich um das Schicksal von Cassia, die von Eurac V verschwunden ist. Der Regent bittet daher um Informationen hinsichtlich ihres derzeitigen Status und lässt fragen, ob es möglich wäre, im Rahmen eines persönlichen Treffens die Rückkehr der Lady Navigatorin zu ihrem Haus zu arrangieren."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, urgent report — we have received an Astropathic message from Regent Aaronto Orsellio. The Navigators are concerned about the fate of Cassia, who disappeared from Eurac V. The regent is requesting an update on her current status and he has also enquired about the possibility of a personal meeting to negotiate and to arrange the return of the Lady Navigator to her House."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, eine dringende Meldung ... wird haben eine astropathische Nachricht von Regent Aaronto Orsellio erhalten. Die Navigatoren sorgen sich um das Schicksal von Cassia, die von Eurac-V verschwunden ist. Der Regent bittet daher um Informationen hinsichtlich ihres derzeitigen Status und lässt fragen, ob es möglich wäre, im Rahmen eines persönlichen Treffens die Rückkehr der Lady Navigatorin zu ihrem Haus zu arrangieren."

languages.text: « Un rapport urgent, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! Nous avons reçu un message astropathique du régent Aaronto Orsellio. Les navigateurs s'inquiètent du sort de Cassia qui a disparu d'Eurac-V. Le régent demande à être informé de sa situation actuelle et aimerait pouvoir vous rencontrer en personne afin de négocier le retour de la dame navigatrice au sein de sa maison. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, urgent report — we have received an Astropathic message from Regent Aaronto Orsellio. The Navigators are concerned about the fate of Cassia, who disappeared from Eurac V. The regent is requesting an update on her current status and he has also enquired about the possibility of a personal meeting to negotiate and to arrange the return of the Lady Navigator to her House."

traits.locale_text: « Un rapport urgent, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! Nous avons reçu un message astropathique du régent Aaronto Orsellio. Les navigateurs s'inquiètent du sort de Cassia qui a disparu d'Eurac-V. Le régent demande à être informé de sa situation actuelle et aimerait pouvoir vous rencontrer en personne afin de négocier le retour de la dame navigatrice au sein de sa maison. »

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、緊急報告です。摂政アーロント・オーセリオから感応通信官のメッセージが届きました。航宙士達は、ユーラック・Vから姿を消したカシアの行末を心配しています。摂政は彼女の現状に関する最新情報を求めていて、さらに個人的に会って、航宙士カシアを一族の元へ戻す交渉及び調整ができないかと尋ねています」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, urgent report — we have received an Astropathic message from Regent Aaronto Orsellio. The Navigators are concerned about the fate of Cassia, who disappeared from Eurac V. The regent is requesting an update on her current status and he has also enquired about the possibility of a personal meeting to negotiate and to arrange the return of the Lady Navigator to her House."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、緊急報告です。摂政アーロント・オーセリオから感応通信官のメッセージが届きました。航宙士達は、ユーラック・Vから姿を消したカシアの行末を心配しています。摂政は彼女の現状に関する最新情報を求めていて、さらに個人的に会って、航宙士カシアを一族の元へ戻す交渉及び調整ができないかと尋ねています」

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, aciliyetle bildiriyorum: Naip Aaronto Orsellio'dan Astropatik mesaj geldi. Rotacılar, Eurac V'te kaybolan Cassia'nın başına bir şey gelmiş olmasından korkuyor. Naip, Leydi Rotacı'nın mevcut durumunu iletmenizi ve Cassia'nın haneye iadesine ilişkin şartları tartışmak adına hususi bir görüşme yapmanızın mümkün olup olmadığını öğrenmek istiyor."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, urgent report — we have received an Astropathic message from Regent Aaronto Orsellio. The Navigators are concerned about the fate of Cassia, who disappeared from Eurac V. The regent is requesting an update on her current status and he has also enquired about the possibility of a personal meeting to negotiate and to arrange the return of the Lady Navigator to her House."
